page.title: 12Use made of canal at Bettws
page.content: The children aged 7 to 11 in our school were asked if they visited the canal at Bettws.We found out that{76%} of them went for{walks}along the tow path,and{17%}use the tow path as a { {route}to friends'and relatives'homes. Only 6 children questioned had never visited the canal.{ { }The tow path is used by cyclists and {37%}of the children in our school{ride their{bicycles}there.Most of these were 9 to 11 year olds. Children also go{fishing}in the canal,but out of the{17%}from our school who fish in the canal most were boys. On our visit to the canal some children from a local special school were being taught to handle{canoes}in the canal. Mark Powell and Matthew McCarthy
